bioconda.name: rnaquast
bioconda.summary: rnaQUAST is a tool for evaluating RNA-Seq assemblies using reference genome and gene database. In addition, rnaQUAST is also capable of estimating gene database coverage by raw reads and de novo quality assessment using third-party software.

biocontainers.name: rnaquast
biocontainers.summary: Rnaquast is a tool for evaluating rna-seq assemblies using reference genome and gene database. in addition, rnaquast is also capable of estimating gene database coverage by raw reads and de novo quality assessment using third-party software.

biotools.summary: Quality assessment tool for de novo transcriptome assemblies.

bioschemas.name: rnaQUAST
bioschemas.summary: Quality assessment tool for de novo transcriptome assemblies.

galaxy.summary: rnaQuast (RNA Quality Assessment Tool) evaluates genome assemblies.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Quality assessment tool for de novo transcriptome assemblies.
